channel.title: Whip
channel.description:
For some reason when i attack some-thing its only show block anim ive tryed removing the anim still nothing..

item.title: Whip
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

did u ever consider the fact that the rat is attacking at the same exact time that your attacking?
and when you are attacked you do the block anim…?

Read full topic

item.title: Whip
item.dc:creator: @vengscape vengscape
item.description:
@vengscape wrote:

all you have to do is:

  1. Download the whip attack anim
  2. Go to client.java
  3. Search GetWepAnim or something similar (this is in client.java server side)
  4. Search for your whip item no. if its not there add this

if(id == YOUR WHIP ITEM NUMBER!) // whip
{
return 1658;
}

Enjoy

Read full topic
